name: Tale of Dark
description:
Warning! Some NPC's quests cannot be completed because we be late to the deadline yo. Sorry.

Ineed, we didn't manage to finish it on time, but it's a project we love nonetheless. 

It's a small narrative game about a world, where sun is no more. How do folks take it? How would you take it?

WASD to move
E to interact

We will make sure to finish this project up. Hopefully, you will still be there to check it out.
